title: ImagePaste
name: ImagePaste
description: Takes two images and an (x,y) coordinate and draws the second image over the first image with the upper-left corner at coordinate (x,y).

arguments.name: image2
arguments.description: The image that is pasted on top of image1.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate where the upper-left corner of image2 is pasted.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate where the upper-left corner of image2 is pasted.
